name: AppliSense
description: A little MQTT sensor that listens to your home appliances!

scripts.build: rm -rf build/* && tsc && vite build src/www && cp src/www/assets/* build && npm run gzip && npm run dump
scripts.gzip: cd ./build && gzip -kf index.html && gzip -kf setup.html && gzip -kf lumenator.js && gzip -kf lumenator.css
scripts.dump: cd ./build && xxd -i -u index.html.gz >> index.html.h && xxd -i -u setup.html.gz >> setup.html.h && xxd -i -u lumenator.js.gz >> lumenator.js.h && xxd -i -u lumenator.css.gz >> lumenator.css.h
